fields.name: source
fields.title: Source
fields.description: The institutional owner of the item ('NYPL').'

fields.name: primary-id
fields.title: Primary ID
fields.description: The UUID (primary identifier) for the digitized item.

fields.name: title
fields.title: Title
fields.description: The primary title for the item.

fields.name: alternative-title
fields.title: Alternative title
fields.description: A pipe-delimited list of additional titles for the item.

fields.name: contributor
fields.title: Contributor
fields.description: A pipe-delimited list of persons or organizations that contributed to the creation of the content. Names are usually taken from Library of Congress Name Authority File.

fields.name: abstract
fields.title: Abstract
fields.description: A summary or description of the content.

fields.name: date
fields.title: Date
fields.description: A pipe-delimited list of dates or date ranges related to the creation of the content.

fields.name: genre
fields.title: Genre
fields.description: A pipe-delimited list of terms describing the nature of the content.

fields.name: topical-subject
fields.title: Topical subject
fields.description: A pipe-delimited list of topical terms describing the content. Terms are usually taken from LCSH and may have been part of complex subject headings.

fields.name: name-subject
fields.title: Name subject
fields.description: A pipe-delimited list of persons or organizations the content depicts or contains. Terms are usually taken from LC Name Authority File and may have been part of complex subject headings.

fields.name: geographic-subject
fields.title: Geographic subject
fields.description: A pipe-delimited list of places related to the content. Terms are usually taken from LCSH and may have been part of complex subject headings.

fields.name: title-subject
fields.title: Title subject
fields.description: A pipe-delimited list of works the content is about. Terms may have been part of complex subject headings.

fields.name: temporal-subject
fields.title: Temporal subject
fields.description: A pipe-delimited list of time periods describing the content. Terms may have been part of complex subject headings.

fields.name: type-of-resource
fields.title: Type of resource
fields.description: A pipe-delimited list of terms that specify the characteristics and general type of content of the resource. Terms taken from the MODS controlled vocabulary for type of resource.

fields.name: place-of-publication
fields.title: Place of publication
fields.description: A pipe-delimited list of places related to the publication, distribution, or manufacture of the item.

fields.name: publisher
fields.title: Publisher
fields.description: A pipe-delimited list of names related to the publication, distribution, or manufacture of the item.

fields.name: form
fields.title: Form
fields.description: A pipe-delimited list of terms describing the physical format of the item.

fields.name: extent
fields.title: Extent
fields.description: A pipe-delimited list of statements describing the size, length, or duration of the item.

fields.name: notes
fields.title: Notes
fields.description: A pipe-delimited list of notes related to the content or physical condition of the item or content.

fields.name: link
fields.title: Link
fields.description: A URL pointing to the item's corresponding webpage in Digital Collections.

fields.name: image
fields.title: Image
fields.description: A URL pointing to a medium-sized image of the first page of the item.
